name: AmazonBrandFilter
description: Filters out all unknown brands from Amazon search results.

scripts.win-build-gecko: Remove-Item dist/gecko -Recurse -Force; webpack --mode development --config engines/gecko/webpack.config.js; node scripts\post-build-update-manifest-gecko.js
scripts.win-build-chromium: Remove-Item dist/chromium -Recurse -Force; webpack --mode development --config engines/chromium/webpack.config.js; node scripts\post-build-update-manifest-chromium.js
scripts.nix-build-gecko: rm -rf dist/gecko && webpack --mode development --config engines/gecko/webpack.config.js && node scripts/post-build-update-manifest-gecko.js
scripts.nix-build-chromium: rm -rf dist/chromium && webpack --mode development --config engines/chromium/webpack.config.js && node scripts/post-build-update-manifest-chromium.js
